Interface FeatureManagerProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Weighted
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextClassLoaderFeatureManagerProvider, FallbackTestFeatureManagerProvider, JNDIFeatureManagerProvider, StaticFeatureManagerProvider, TestFeatureManagerProvider, ThreadLocalFeatureManagerProvider

    public interface FeatureManagerProvider
extends Weighted

    SPI used by FeatureContext to lookup the FeatureManager to use.

    Implementations and their weights:
